faqs.What are your hours of operation?: We are open from 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Friday.
faqs.How can I contact customer support?: You can contact us via email at support@example.com.
faqs.What is the return policy?: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase.
faqs.Do you ship internationally?: Yes, we ship to most countries around the world.
faqs.How do I track my order?: You can track your order using the tracking number provided in your confirmation email.
